abstract: Passenger bush crashes into oil tanker in Karachi, Pakistant, killing at least 62 people.
lead_paragraph: Rescue workers said the bus, operating in Sindh Province, was carrying 62 passengers inside and 10 on the roof.
snippet: Rescue workers said the bus, operating in Sindh Province, was carrying 62 passengers inside and 10 on the roof.

headline.main: Scores Killed After Bus Collides With Oil Tanker in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Dozens Die as Bus Collides With Truck
